DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic And/Or Recurrent Malignant Neoplasm Tissue Sample Sequence Number Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: numerical value to represent the sequence count of metastatic/recurrent tissue biospecimens

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Metastatic And/Or Recurrent Malignant Neoplasm Tissue Sample Sequence Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A term referring to the clinical or pathologic observation of a tumor extension from its original site of growth to another anatomic site._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The reemergence of a malignant neoplasm after a period of remission._A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation._A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
